title: Admissible operators for sun-dual semigroups
authors: Sahiba Arora and Felix L. Schwenninger
abstract:
We extend classical duality results by Weiss on admissible operators to
settings where the dual semigroup lacks strong continuity. This is possible
using the sun-dual framework, which is not immediate from the duality of the
input and output maps. This extension enables the testing of admissibility for
a broader range of examples, in particular for state space of continuous
functions or $L^1$.
